Room.Name: Advanced Level Fighter's Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are already at the highest level of training available here.
Room.LongDescription: To advance your fighting skills further, you must journey to the City of Kista and talk to the Jinsuti Master, who has studied every form of hand-to- hand fighting known to living kind. He will guide your training from this point forward. Good luck in your quest for enlightment.
